executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Please generate tests that can run in CI without real Supabase or Gemini credentials. Mock Supabase client/auth/session (including approval gating via profiles.is_approved). For /api/tts, mock global fetch to Google Generative Language API and assert error handling when GEMINI_API_KEY is missing and when upstream returns non-OK. Prefer testing Next.js route handlers directly when possible. Avoid tests that require manual admin approval; simulate approval state in mocks.
